howItWorks.title: Your path from audit to ROI in 90 days

steps.title: AI Audit

faq.question: Why should I pay for an audit when I can just try AI tools myself?
faq.answer: Most companies waste $50K+ on AI tools that sit unused because they lack a strategic implementation plan. An audit gives you a clear roadmap with ROI projections, so you invest in the right solutions from day one. Think of it as insurance against expensive mistakes.

faq.question: What if the audit reveals no good AI opportunities for my business?
faq.answer: If we determine AI isn't a fit for your current workflows, we'll tell you upfront and refund 50% of the audit fee. However, in 3+ years of consulting, we've never had a client where we couldn't identify at least one high-ROI opportunity.

faq.question: Do I need to have a technical team to implement your recommendations?
faq.answer: No. We handle all implementation if you choose the Full Implementation package. For Audit/Roadmap clients, we provide detailed documentation and vendor recommendations that any technical partner can execute. We can also refer implementation partners if needed.

faq.question: How do you measure ROI on AI projects?
faq.answer: We establish baseline metrics during the audit (e.g., time spent on manual tasks, cost per customer interaction) and track improvements post-implementation. Most clients see measurable ROI within 60-90 days through reduced labor costs, faster response times, or increased conversion rates.

about.title: About Alex Morgan
about.bio:
I've spent 8+ years implementing AI and automation for startups and mid-market companies. I've seen teams waste hundreds of thousands on shiny AI tools that never get used, and I've helped dozens of companies cut through the hype to ship AI that actually pays for itself.

My approach is simple: audit your workflows, identify high-ROI opportunities, build a custom roadmap, and implement in sprints with measurable outcomes at every step.

No 6-month consulting engagements with vague deliverables. No vendor lock-in. Just results you can measure in 90 days.
credentials: 8+ years in AI and automation consulting
Former ML engineer at Fortune 500 tech company
Certified in GPT-4, Claude, and major automation platforms
